ChunkText: the fulbright program is the flagship international educational exchange program sponsored by the u.s. government and is designed to build lasting connections between the people of the united states and the people of other countries.
ContextBefore: the education abroad office helps umbc students find a summer, winter, semester or academic year study abroad program that will enable them earn credits toward their umbc degree while having a life-changing experience in one of dozens of countries around the world.
ContextAfter: the fulbright u.s. student program awards grants each year to rising and graduating seniors, current graduate students, and recent alumni students who are thinking of earning a masters degree, conducting research or teaching english in more than 140 countries worldwide.
